medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting for the past 3 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days ago, exacerbated by meals, inspiration, and certain positions. There were no fevers or chills, diarrhea or constipation, urinary symptoms, chest pain, or shortness of breath.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation (on Coumadin), chronic mesenteric ischemia (status post right CIA to ___ bypass), development of incision hernia (status post CST repair ___, and subsequent dehiscence (status post washout and VAC placement), hyperlipidemia, hypertension, left breast cancer status post mastectomy and breast implant, arthritis/spinal stenosis.
